text: Can you please modify my reminder to submit the proposal at 2 pm on March 25th?
Sure, may I know your username and password?
My username is user3 and my password is user3pass.
Okay, I have retrieved your token. Now, please tell me the new time and content for your reminder.
The content is "Submit proposal" and the time is "2023-03-25 14:00:00".
Alright, your reminder has been updated successfully.
